body.name: Sucrwovk Classic Mini Retro Game Console Built in 800+Classic Games and Dual Wireless Remote Controllers,AV and HDMI HD Output Video Game System for Kids and Adults as Ideal Gift.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 31 mins
features: 1.Updated Classic 800 Retro Game Console: This classic mini retro game console built-in 800+ classic retro games without repetition,which can bring you back to your childhood memories in an instant.

2.Dual Wireless Remote Controllers:This classic mini game console comes with dual wireless remote controllers.No cable constraint,it is convenient for you to do all kinds of game operations during the game.

3.AV and HDMI Output,Plug and Play:Just use the charger to connect the old video game console to the power source,then connect to the TV.Press “SECECT + START” at the same time for two seconds to start the retro game,no debugging,plug and play.At the same time.

4.Ideal Gift for Kids and Adults :This classic mini retro game console provides a fun way to create happy childhood memories,Let children experience the fun of our childhood.It's also a great Holiday gifts for children,friends and lovers.

5.Tips：1.It's a third-party produc;2.This wireless controller requires 2*AAA Batteries(not included in the package);3.We support the return and exchange of goods without reason within 30 days,If you have any question about our product,please feel free to contact us
body.description: Game type:1.Classic action games.2.Classic shooting games.3.Classic sports games .4.Classic fighting games.5.Classic racing games.6.Classic puzzle games.Specification:1.Color - Grey2.Material - Plastic and metal3.Joystick - A Pair4.Output - AV and HDMI5.Applicable platform - TV6.Plug - Origil US plug7. Game Console Size - 5.12*3.94*1.77 inchPackage Includes:1 * Retro Games Console2 * Game Handle (Not Including Batteries)1 * AV Cable1 * AV to HDMI Converter1 * Manual &p; Game List1 * US electric power plugImportant Notice:1. Mini Console supports AV and HDMI TV, IfyourTV has only HDM, please use an adapter to connect.2. Not compatible with 4K resolution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun and nostalgic games
reviews.reviewText: Great product. It doesn’t have an option to save your games so if you play it, pick one game at a time and don’t reset or turn it off so you can keep your place. Once you complete that particular game, you can go to another one.
